titles.title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 619 Hewett Street in Neillsville, Wisconsin, as the "Corporal Mitchell Red Cloud, Jr. Post Office".
To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 619 Hewett Street in Neillsville, Wisconsin, as the "Corporal Mitchell Red Cloud, Jr. Post Office".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Request to order reported by unanimous consent failed.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Request to order reported by unanimous consent failed.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Ordered to be Reported by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: Designates the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 619 Hewett Street in Neillsville, Wisconsin, as the "Corporal Mitchell Red Cloud, Jr. Post Office."
